mdRecord.dcterms:description: Describes trip from Spotsylvania Court House to Fort Delaware as prisoner of war. Reports has received letters, clothes, money. Sends news of relatives living in North. Agonizes over not knowing about others in the family, including his brother, Elihu H. Barclay. Anticipates exchange.
There are three files available: a PDF transcription, a plain text transcription, and a PDF which was created from scans of the original document.
